short_description: oxford private care is a home health care services provider based in united kingdom.
long_description: oxford private care is a leading provider of home care services in oxfordshire and extending across the south of england for our live-in care service. providing high quality care services for the elderly and dependent individuals. we are a leading, people-centred care company, committed to both clients and our employees. read more 24 hour support to live in your own home, offering a real alternative to residential care, "your care, your home, your choice".
generated_description: oxford private care, legally known as oxford private care ltd., is a family-run, independent care provider based in oxford, england. established in the early 1980s, the company has grown to become a leading home care service provider in oxfordshire and extends its services across the south of england. oxford private care offers a range of care services, including hourly care, live-in care, hair and beauty services, and foot healthcare. the company is accredited and contracted by oxfordshire social and community services, and it collaborates with local doctors, district nurses, and other agencies to deliver a comprehensive care service. all staff undergo enhanced disclosure & barring service (dbs) checks, and the company is a member of the united kingdom home care association ltd. and the oxfordshire association of care providers.
generated_business_tags: home care | live-in care services | hair and beauty services | foot care services
